BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-RestServer
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Starts REST server to execute commands from network requests
BundleInfo.Description:
Starts REST server to execute commands from network requests
Server is listening on a local port for HTTP requests. The request content is executed as a ChimeraX command and the generated output is returned as the response.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Command :: remotecontrol rest :: General :: Control REST server
